name: Hole (grizzlystudio)
description:
Very Addicting Game!

Hole is a very addicting game, you are a ball and you have to climb on "walls" to reach the hole and win the game. A very simple one finger mechanic made for you to play it anywhere. You have a variation of skins you can put on and play with.

Game is in the beta version, many version will come.
Features in this version:
- Random color walls and floor (Beware - It may contain very bright colors)
- Shop & Skins
- 90 levels

Hope you enjoy!

Background Song: Herr Doktor - Can You Kiss Me First Synthwave Cover

Direct donations if PayPal does not work: RO75RNCB0022159009530001
